text:
M.YAKOOTH
Mobile: 00971504250681/00918508438667/ E-Mail: yakoothm@yahoo.co.in
JOB OBJECTIVE
In quest of middle managerial level assignments in Project Management / Design Engineering /
Piping Operations, preferably in Oil & Gas / Manufacturing industry/Construction/MEP
Location Preference: Gulf countries (Anywhere in the World)

Skilled in piping designing and draftting techniques, engineering drawings and graphic arts
